Hypergeometric Enrichment in input peak ranges.

customEnrichment.Rd

This function will perform hypergeometric enrichment of a given peak matches object and ranges.

customEnrichment(ranges = NULL, matches = NULL, bgdPeaks = NULL)

Arguments

ranges

A GenomicRanges object of peaks/regions to overlap with peaks.

matches

A custom peakAnnotation matches object used as input for the hypergeometric test. See motifmatchr::matchmotifs() for additional information.

bgdPeaks

A SummarizedExperiment of background peaks from getBgdPeaks can be NULL for using all peaks.

Examples

#Project
proj <- getTestProject()
#> Error in getTestProject(): could not find function "getTestProject"

#Get Peaks
peaks <- getPeakSet(proj)
#> Error in getPeakSet(proj): could not find function "getPeakSet"

#Custom C1 Mono
peaks1 <- peaks[names(peaks)=="C1"]
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'peaks' not found

#All Peaks
customEnrichment(
  ranges = peaks1, 
  matches = getMatches(proj)
)
#> Error in customEnrichment(ranges = peaks1, matches = getMatches(proj)): could not find function "customEnrichment"

#Background Peaks
customEnrichment(
 ranges = peaks1, 
  matches = getMatches(proj), 
 bgdPeaks = getBgdPeaks(proj, force=TRUE)
)
